trans-unit.resname: PHJ·1 | Goblin Mutant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PHJ·1 | Goblin Mutant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater.

trans-unit.resname: PHJ·1 | Goblin Mutant | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.

trans-unit.resname: PHJ·2 | Ihsan's Shade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PHJ·3 | Krovikan Vampire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, if a creature dealt damage by CARDNAME this turn died, put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Sacrifice it when you lose control of CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of each end step, if a creature dealt damage by CARDNAME this turn died, put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Sacrifice it when you lose control of CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: PHJ·4 | Surge of Strength | Card Name
PHJ·4 | Surge of Strength | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a red or green card.
trans-unit.target: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a red or green card.

trans-unit.resname: PHJ·4 | Surge of Strength | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that creature's mana value.
trans-unit.target: Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that creature's mana value.

trans-unit.resname: PHJ·5 | Yavimaya Ants | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PHJ·5 | Yavimaya Ants | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Cumulative upkeep {G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: Cumulative upkeep {G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
